review: Pretty awesome. I have an Apple TV for comparison. The fire stick is fast, comes loaded with everything you want and it's easy to set up. Very pleased at the price point
author: Benjamin Taylor

review: Works great -- the walk through video was very self explanatory.  I love that after you set it up on any TV you can just plug it into any other TV in your house and it works.  I have it with a trial Netflix account and have been using it a lot for that.  I am not sure if I will use it as much when it runs out.  Works great.  We love it and the kids love it!
author: erinrae23

review: Great option for watching Prime videos or using other souces of streaming content, like music or SlingTV. Its beyond easy to install and the remote is simple, but well designed. There is also an phone app you can use as a remote as well.
author: Lalatack

review: A better product than I expected; fast, reliable and worth the Prime Membership!
author: Al Fields

review: This item has met my full expectations. Easy to use and set up (even has a cartoon guide to help you through it). Arrived on time and in great condition. So far I have only used netflix but you can use Amazon prime, purchase and play games and many other sources of entertainment.
author: Nicole

review: Its a great deal for the price, but before they changed the verbiage on the site it said it was miracast certified... and im not sure about now, but then it was in fact not certified. Unfortunately i found that out later. I wanted netflix and amazon instant videos in my bedroom and the ability to mirror my surface to it. It does not mirror windows tablets or pcs to it. They have caught some bad feedback on this and changed the way the listing appears now. It came out with half-baked software that ran like s***. took me 3 days to complete the first update. Updates now are much faster but will almost always fail the first attempt.
author: Ryan Giles

review: Not enough movies included under the Prime membership.
